resources.string: Are you sure you want to reset current game?
Are you sure you want to reset current round?

"20 tiles will be drawn from a pool of 40.

"
"Tiles are numbered from 1 to 30. Tiles numbered 11 to 19 are present twice and there" "is an additional wildcard.
" "After each draw, you have to place the tile on the line. Once placed, it cannot be moved.
" "The goal is to make the longest possible series of ascending or equal numbers.

"
"Once the 20th tile has been placed, each series will be awarded points. The sum will be " "your total score.
"
